name: OI Shampoo for Softness and Shine
about: What it is: A rich shampoo, infused with roucou oil, that leaves hair with amazing softness, shine, and body...Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:.- Dryness.- Shine.- Volumizing..Key Benefits: - Cleanses and softens hair.- Strengthens hair, protecting against the effects of aging and environmental damage.- Promotes soft, shiny, full-bodied hair..Highlighted Ingredients:- Roucou Oil: Strengthens and protects hair with beta-carotene and antioxidants...Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS & SLES...What Else You Need to Know: This nourishing, rich shampoo is infused with roucou oil, a powerful antioxidant, as well as an active ingredient extracted from rose oil. It gently cleanses and protects, leaving hair softer, shinier, and full of body.
ingredients: -Roucou Oil: Strengthens and protects hair with beta-carotene and antioxidants...Aqua/Water/Eau, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauryl Sulfoacetate, Sodium Methyl 2-Sulfolaurate, Panthenol, Parfum/Fragrance, Sodium Methyl Isethionate, Benzyl Alcohol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Lauric Acid, PPG-26-Buteth-26, Coco-Glucoside, Phenethyl Benzoate, Glyceryl Oleate, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Sodium Benzoate, Glycol Distearate, Citric Acid, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Polyquaternium-7, Disodium 2-Sulfolaurate, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Laurate, Amodimethicone, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, C11-15 Pareth-7, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil/Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glyceryl Stearate, Glycerin, Laureth-9, Citronellol, Geraniol, Trideceth-12, Bixa Orellana Seed Extract.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Gently massage into damp hair, then rinse thoroughly..-Repeat if necessary. .-Follow with OI Conditioner for Softness and Shine (sold separately).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried it due to my hairdresser suggesting this brand. It made my hair super oily even though I use a small amount and rinse well. I have fine, straight hair.

reviews.review_title: It made my hair fall out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After a month of using this shampoo I noticed significant hair fall. I continued using it for a while because it's so expensive and I thought maybe it was just a coincidence. But as soon as I stopped using it my hair went back to normal. The scent is also unpleasant. It did leave my hair very soft and less oily in general but completely not worth it. I agree with another reviewer it felt like my hair had been stripped.

reviews.review_title: The shampoo is spilled and has no seal. Qu
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo arrived with an open cap and spilled. Additionally, there is no seal under the cap, which makes me doubt its authenticity. It seems like it might have been poured from another bottle and isn’t the original product.Shamr on you, Sephora! . shame. Shame on

reviews.review_title: Good shampoo if you can handle the smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shampoo and conditioner make my hair very soft and healthy feeling but I can not get over how bad the smell is! It literally smells like bug spray/citronella candles. I regret buying the full size. Maybe the shampoo will work to keep mosquitoes away in the summer at least.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Used for the first time last evening and that will be my last. The scent of this is not pleasant (my boyfriend said my hair smelled industrial) and it is so strong and overpowering. It also lingers for a very long time - it has been almost 24 hours since I washed my hair, and the scent is still very strong even after using other products. I did like how my hair felt after using this but cannot get over the fragrance. Will definitely be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Davine's OI Shampoo is amazing! It smells absolutely amazing and it works great! My hair feels healthy and thick. This shampoo doesn't leave my hair feeling completely stripped of all the good oils, like many other shampoos do. The lather it gives is awesome and I recommend to anyone who wants a clean, refreshing wash!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this free from Davine for my honest review. loved this shampoo, it was amazing from the scent to the way it made my hair feel. I loved that it had a natural feel to it and my hair felt healthy after using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest option. I’ve never heard of this brand so I was intrigued to try based on the packaging. But honestly, it’s such a tiny bottle for the price. That would be what stops me from ever purchasing in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Davines OI Shampoo is a game-changer for maintaining soft, shiny, and voluminous hair. Its rich formula delivers an antioxidant action that protects and revitalizes hair, ensuring it stays healthy and vibrant. The luxurious lather cleanses gently, leaving hair incredibly smooth and manageable. Plus, the long-lasting perfume is a delightful bonus, leaving hair smelling fresh and elegant all day. Ideal for all hair types, this shampoo is a must-have for achieving salon-quality results at home.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My hair feels incredibly soft and clean after every wash, with gorgeous shine. The hair is shiny but not greasy and it has good body to it. The shampoo lathers beautifully and a little product goes a long way! The only downside is the bottle; it's easy to over-pour. I wish it had a different cap. Lastly, the scent is amazing-very fresh and clean! It lingers in my hair for a long time and it’s very subtle but still noticable. I’m thoroughly impressed with this shampoo and will definitely be repurchasing it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this shampoo because it leaves my hair very soft. I've been using it for a couple of weeks and I can see the difference. It's definitely one of my favorites. This brand is one of my favorites, I recomend this.

reviews.review_title: A staple in my hair care routine

The only reason I took away a star is I don’t care for the smell; it was a little strong for my taste. I received this product for free, but this is my honest opinion of the product.

I fell in love with this shampoo! It’s amazing, lathers so smoothly and washes so well. My hair and scalp feel so clean. I also love how easily it is to wash it off the hair. The shampoo is high quality, you can instantly see it. The bottle is small, but it requires so little of the product, it will lasts forever. Overall, definitely would come back to it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Love this shampoo! Packaging could improve.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: New user of Davines hair products and trust that I will repurchase. I usually do 2 rounds of shampoo on my 3rd day hair with products and dry shampoo and with this I only needed one pass and I have a clean scalp and hair. Smells expensive and lathers beautifully. If I really have to nitpick, I would say I do not like the packaging without a pump or spout. It is a mess using it in the shower. I would have to either transfer it to a different container or buy a pump that will work. Product inside though is 10/10!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: [I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review]  I had never heard of this brand before, but upon reading the previous reviews, I had high hopes. Unfortunately, I did not see much difference using it in comparison to my go-to shampoo. If anything, my hair felt slightly more coarse around the roots for that wash cycle. On that note, I did notice less greasy-ness on my scalp (I have naturally very oily hair that gets greasy ~6 hours after I wash it). The smell was a heavy nature-inspired cologne scent. Personally I like nature-inspired scents, but this was a bit too strong for my liking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted the OI Shampoo by Davines in exchange for my honest opinion. The main thing I am worried about with my hair is keeping it soft and silky. I dye it a lot so it can get a rough texture from time to time. This shampoo helped improve the smoothness of my hair with one wash and it felt so much softer than before.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently started using Davines OI Shampoo, and I'm absolutely thrilled with the results. From the first wash, my hair felt noticeably softer and smoother. The scent is delightful – a fresh, clean fragrance that isn’t overpowering but lingers pleasantly throughout the day. This shampoo has worked wonders on my frizzy hair, leaving it more manageable and shiny.  One of the standout benefits is its ability to deeply cleanse without stripping my hair of its natural oils. I also appreciate how it adds volume without weighing my hair down. My hair looks healthier and more vibrant since I started using it. Enter Davines OI Shampoo, a luxurious hair cleanser that has transformed my tresses into something truly extraordinary.  **First Impression**  The sleek, apothecary-inspired packaging immediately caught my eye. The elegant bottle houses a golden liquid that exudes a heavenly blend of amber and vanilla extract. The scent alone was enough to entice me to give this shampoo a try.  **The Experience**  Upon applying the shampoo, I was greeted with a rich, foamy lather that gently cleansed my hair without stripping it of its natural oils. As I massaged it into my scalp, the amber and vanilla notes enveloped my senses, creating a spa-like experience in the comfort of my own shower.  **Results**  After rinsing, my hair felt incredibly soft and silky. The frizz and tangles that plagued me before had miraculously disappeared. My hair was left with a lustrous shine and a captivating fragrance that lingered throughout the day.  **Key Ingredients**  The secret behind OI Shampoo's magic lies in its carefully curated blend of natural ingredients. Roucou oil, extracted from the seeds of the achiote tree, provides UV protection, while beta-carotene protects against oxidative damage. Jojoba oil nourishes and moisturizes, leaving hair feeling supple and healthy.  **My Verdict**  Davines OI Shampoo is a game-changer for my hair. It cleanses thoroughly without over-stripping, leaving my hair feeling soft, shiny, and effortlessly manageable. The luxurious scent and pampering experience make every wash a delightful ritual.  If you're looking for a shampoo that will elevate your hair to new heights, I highly recommend giving Davines OI Shampoo a try. Your hair will thank you for it! #gifted by davines
